block.p: Nicole Suzanne Berlin, a daughter of Renee and Alan D. Berlin of Greenwich, Conn., was married last evening to Michael Robert Marra, the son of Florence and Michael Marra of Laurel Springs, N.J. Judith Wallach, an adjunct leader of the New York Society for Ethical Culture, officiated at the University Club in New York.

The couple, both 29, are associates at New York law firms, she at Rudolph & Beer, and he at Proskauer Rose. The bride, a cum laude graduate of Brandeis University, and the bridegroom, who graduated summa cum laude from the University of Iowa, received law degrees from New York University, where they met.

Nicole Suzanne Berlin, a daughter of Renee and Alan D. Berlin of Greenwich, Conn., was married last evening to Michael Robert Marra, the son of Florence and Michael Marra of Laurel Springs, N.J. Judith Wallach, an adjunct leader of the New York Society for Ethical Culture, officiated at the University Club in New York.

The couple, both 29, are associates at New York law firms, she at Rudolph & Beer, and he at Proskauer Rose. The bride, a cum laude graduate of Brandeis University, and the bridegroom, who graduated summa cum laude from the University of Iowa, received law degrees from New York University, where they met.

The bride's father is a senior partner working in the White Plains office of Aitken, Irvin, Berlin & Vrooman, a law firm. Her mother is a psychotherapist and geriatric care manager in private practice in White Plains.
The bridegroom's mother is an aide at Chews Elementary School in Gloucester Township, N.J. His father retired as a crew chief for Boeing Helicopters, in Philadelphia.
